attributes.action: give pension rights to the Gurkhas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These members of the Nepalese force have been part of the British army for about 200 years. They have fought well, and many killed on the behalf of this country.We owe them a pension.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give pension rights to the Gurkhas."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17627


Prime Minister's Office
